TypeSignature.Value: public class ErrorProvider : System.ComponentModel.Component, System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class ErrorProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider, ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 提供一个用户界面，用于指示窗体上的某个控件具有与其相关联的错误。

span.span: Provides a user interface for indicating that a control on a form has an error associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示简单的机制，用于表示向最终用户在窗体上的控件具有与之相关联的错误。 presents a simple mechanism for indicating to the end user that a control on a form has an error associated with it. 如果控件指定了错误描述字符串，则控件旁边将显示一个图标。If an error description string is specified for the control, an icon appears next to the control. 图标的闪烁时间以指定方式，通过指定的费率。The icon flashes in the manner specified by , at the rate specified by . 当鼠标悬停在该图标时，显示工具提示显示的错误描述字符串。When the mouse hovers over the icon, a ToolTip appears showing the error description string. 通常情况下，使用中并与数据绑定控件关联。Typically, you use in association with data-bound controls. 使用时数据绑定控件，您必须指定，构造函数中或通过设置属性。When using with data-bound controls, you must specify the , either in the constructor or by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 组件不提供辅助功能客户端的内置支持。The component does not provide built-in support for accessibility clients. 若要使用此组件时，使你的应用程序可访问，必须提供其他可访问的反馈机制。To make your application accessible when using this component, you must provide an additional, accessible feedback mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通知数据输入错误的用户。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建包含控件，控件，和一个控制，每个验证其内容和为每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例设置错误图标选项使用和属性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法在有无相应的错误文本在过程中调用控件的事件，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control’s event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用与和以指示将为用户的数据错误。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误图标的闪烁时间在指定的速率。The error icon flashes at the specified rate. 值为零集到。A value of zero sets to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通知数据输入错误的用户。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建包含控件，控件，和一个控制，每个验证其内容和为每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例设置错误图标选项使用和属性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法在有无相应的错误文本在过程中调用控件的事件，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以附加到控件的数据源，并且你想要监视是否有错误。The is a data source that you can attach to a control and that you want to monitor for errors. 可以将设置为任何集合可实现。 can be set to any collection that implements . 若要在运行时可能发生更改时避免冲突和，应使用而不是设置和单独。To avoid conflicts at run time that can occur when changing and , you should use instead of setting and individually. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用与和以指示将为用户的数据错误。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. 此代码假定你已创建并填充名为`dataSet1`包含名为`dataTable1`。This code assumes you have created and populated a named `dataSet1` containing a named `dataTable1`. 当绑定到如控件控制，请通过指定的错误对象显示为错误标志符号在控件。When you bind the to a control such as the control, errors specified through objects appear as error glyphs in the control. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来检查是否有错误，然后打开文件对话框。The following code example uses the method to check for an error before opening a file dialog box. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含名为`TextBox1`、名为`OpenFileDialog1`，名为的按钮`Button1`，和名为`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a button named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#2)]

span.span: The control to get the padding for.

summary.span: 返回错误图标旁边保留的额外空间量。

span.span: Returns the amount of extra space to leave next to the error icon.

returns.span: 图标与控件之间保留的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to leave between the icon and the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很多图标通常具有中心图像，周围的额外空间，因此填充值时才需要额外的空间是必需的。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary if additional space is necessary. 填充值可以是正数或负数。Padding values can be positive or negative. 负值导致重叠的控件的边缘的图标。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. 默认图标填充为 0。The default icon padding is 0.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Icon { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Icon ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，当为控件设置了错误描述字符串时，该图标显示在控件旁边。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is displayed next to a control when an error description string has been set for the control.

value.span: 发出信号指出有错误发生的 。

span.span: An that signals an error has occurred.

value.span: 默认图标由红色背景圆及其中的感叹号组成。

span.span: The default icon consists of an exclamation point in a circle with a red background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为获得最佳结果，使用的图标大小为 16 x 16 像素。For best results, use an icon of the size 16 x 16 pixels. 指定的图标的大小调整为 16 x 16 像素，如有必要。Specified icons are resized to be 16 x 16 pixels, if necessary.

span.span: The assigned value of the is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRightToLeftChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnRightToLeftChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool RightToLeft { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RightToLeft As Boolean
public: virtual property bool RightToLeft { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示组件是否可用于支持从右向左字体的区域设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the component is used in a locale that supports right-to-left fonts.

value.span: 如果组件可用于从右向左的区域设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component is used in a right-to-left locale; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置此属性为 true，错误图标，显示关联控件的左侧，并按从右到左顺序显示的工具提示文本。When this property is set to true, the error icon appears to the left of the associated control and the ToolTip text is displayed in right-to-left order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ErrorProvider1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ErrorProvider1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#382)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#382)]

summary.span: 设置指定控件的错误描述字符串。

span.span: Sets the error description string for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的长度`value`为大于零，则将显示错误图标，并且错误图标的工具提示将错误说明文本。If the length of `value` is greater than zero, then the error icon is displayed, and the ToolTip for the error icon is the error description text. 如果的长度为零或`value`是`null`，则隐藏错误图标。If the length is zero or `value` is `null`, the error icon is hidden. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通知数据输入错误的用户。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建包含控件，控件，和一个控制，每个验证其内容和为每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例设置错误图标选项使用和属性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法在有无相应的错误文本在过程中调用控件的事件，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图标的最后位置由填充值的图标修改。The final placement of the icon is modified by the icon padding values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通知数据输入错误的用户。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建包含控件，控件，和一个控制，每个验证其内容和为每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例设置错误图标选项使用和属性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法在有无相应的错误文本在过程中调用控件的事件，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. .method public hidebysig instance void SetIconPadding(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control, int32 padding) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 要为其设置空白的 control。

span.span: The control to set the padding for.

param.name: padding
param.span: 要在图标与 control. 之间添加的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to add between the icon and the control.

summary.span: 设置指定控件和错误图标之间应保留的额外空间量。

span.span: Sets the amount of extra space to leave between the specified control and the error icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很多图标通常具有中心图像，周围的额外空间，因此需要额外的空间时，可能才是必需的填充值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary when additional space is necessary. 填充值可以是正数或负数。Padding values can be positive or negative. 负值导致重叠的控件的边缘的图标。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通知数据输入错误的用户。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建包含控件，控件，和一个控制，每个验证其内容和为每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例设置错误图标选项使用和属性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法在有无相应的错误文本在过程中调用控件的事件，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control.
